description:
In this game you will have the experience of moving pieces to form an electronic circuit, while listening to a calm and relaxing soundtrack.
This game is not an electronic circuit simulator but it will be a lot of fun to use electronics in this game.

Characteristics

- A totally minimalist environment.
- A calm and relaxing soundtrack.
- 70 challenges.
- Various electronic components.
- Wide variety of electronic circuits.
name: Puzzletronics
intro: Puzzletronics is a minimalist puzzle-style game.
